description: Learn how to make rice pudding from scratch in just 25 minutes. This recipe is so easy and so creamy, itâ€™ll become an instant favourite.
keywords: Rice pudding,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Video,Raspberry,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,High protein,Wheat free,Rice
name: Easy Creamy Rice Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place rice and milk in a small saucepan and cook over low heat for 15 minutes or until creamy.
Remove pan from heat. Whisk together egg and 1/4 cup of sugar, then pour into rice mixture, stirring to combine. Add vanilla extract and butter, stirring until butter is fully incorporated.
To make the raspberry compote, place berries in a small saucepan with 1 tbs of sugar and 1 tbs of water, and cook on medium heat for 3 minutes or until syrupy.
Divide pudding among bowls. Serve topped with compote and toasted flaked almonds.
